title: Make Super Admin Login entry visible on Shop Login screen

requirements.text: Update the shop authentication UI so the Super Admin portal is reachable from the Shop Login screen by adding a clearly visible "Super Admin Login" navigation control that routes to "/auth/admin/login".
acceptanceCriteria: On "/auth/shop/login", a clearly visible control labeled "Super Admin Login" is present without needing to scroll.
Activating "Super Admin Login" navigates to "/auth/admin/login" and renders the existing AdminLoginPage.
Existing Shop Login and Create New Shop Account actions continue to work as before.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change backend authentication/authorization logic.
Do not change admin portal functionality beyond making its entry point visible.
